name: §a+ §r§nVineshot
description: Fire a projectile that places vines where it lands

actions.command: execute unless block ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:air run setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:vine[north=true] keep
execute unless block ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:air run setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:vine[south=true] keep
execute unless block ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:air run setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:vine[up=true] keep
execute unless block ~-1 ~ ~ minecraft:air run setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:vine[west=true] keep
execute unless block ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:air run setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:vine[east=true] keep
